```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggtext)
library(ggplot2)
library(janitor)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
longitude <- c(-116.7, -120.4, -116.7, -113.5, -115.5, -120.8, -119.5, -113.7, -113.7, -110.7)
latitude <- c(45.3, 42.6, 38.9, 42.1, 35.7, 38.9, 36.2, 39, 41.6, 36.9)

sf_data = cbind(longitude,latitude)

st_data2 = sf_data |>
  as.data.frame() |>
  st_as_sf(coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs= 4326)
```
```{r}
plot(st_data2)
```
```{r}
# Load necessary library
library(sf)

# Create points
point1 <- st_point(c(-116.7, 45.3)) # First point (longitude, latitude)
point2 <- st_point(c(-120.4, 42.6)) # Second point (longitude, latitude)

# Combine points into a single sf object
points_sf <- st_sfc(point1, point2, crs = 4326)

# Plot points
plot(points_sf)

```
```{r}
st_is_valid(point_sf)
```
